remarks: Two-dimensional commutation of a group sum over a "triangular" region. ~ fsum0diag analogue for finite bags.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 5-Jan-2015.)
statement:
psrbag.d $e |- D = { f e. ( NN0 ^m I ) | ( `' f " NN ) e. Fin } $.
psrbagconf1o.1 $e |- S = { y e. D | y oR <_ F } $.
gsumbagdiag.i $e |- ( ph -> I e. V ) $.
gsumbagdiag.f $e |- ( ph -> F e. D ) $.
gsumbagdiag.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
gsumbagdiag.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. CMnd ) $.
gsumbagdiag.x $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( j e. S /\ k e. { x e. D | x oR <_ ( F oF - j ) } ) ) -> X e. B ) $.
gsumbagdiag $p |- ( ph -> ( G gsum ( j e. S , k e. { x e. D | x oR <_ ( F oF - j ) } |-> X ) ) = ( G gsum ( k e. S , j e. { x e. D | x oR <_ ( F oF - k ) } |-> X ) ) ) $.
$d B j k $.
$d D j k x y $.
$d F f j k x y $.
$d G f j k x y $.
$d I f x y $.
$d S j k x $.
$d V x y $.
$d X f x y $.
$d j k ph $.
